sense.def:
Kadar je mrtev človek
buried
, njegovo truplo položijo v zemljo in ga zasujejo s prstjo.

To bury something
pomeni nekaj položiti v jamo in zasuti, največkrat zato, da bi tisto skrili.

seg.quote: Reptiles bury their eggs in holes.

sense.def:
To be buried under something
pomeni, da nekaj pade na nas in smo popolnoma pokriti, zato ne moremo ven.

seg.quote: People were buried beneath mountains of rubble.

sense.def:
To bury one's face in something
pomeni, da poskusimo skriti obraz, tako da ga pritisnemo ob neko stvar.

seg.quote: She buried her face in her hands.

sense.def:
To bury oneself in one's work or an activity
pomeni močno se osredotočiti na neko delo ali dejavnost.

cit.quote: zakopati se v delo ali dejavnost

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
buried away somewhere
, tistega ne moremo zlahka najti ali videti.
